trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_SEQ_00<tab>Ujin needs help if she is to do what the gods ask of her.
TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_TODO_00<tab>Survey the land for gaunt gedan.
TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_UJIN_000_000<tab>Tell me, are you an experienced hunter?
TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_UJIN_000_001<tab>I was told today that I need to go and clean the altar to the west. However, when I visited the area earlier, it was surrounded by beasts.
TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_UJIN_000_003<tab>Please go to Chakha Zoh and slay any gaunt gedan you find. I cannot complete my duties without your help.
TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_UJIN_000_004<tab>Please go to Chakha Zoh and slay any gaunt gedan you find.
TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_UJIN_000_010<tab>You have already slayed the creatures? It seems I made the right decision asking you for help.

TEXT_STMBDZ519_02770_UJIN_000_022<tab>Please take this as a token of my thanks. I am currently training to be an udgan myself, though I am still lacking in experience. I look forward to the day when I am able to pray for you.
